extendedInfo.description: Your perfect home is out there. Find it first with the most accurate app for searching homes for sale and rent-- now with ability to find homes based on school and district assignment boundaries!"Makes searching for homes with schooling in mind a little bit easier..." --James Zahn, The Rock Father"Great schools in the area? Now you're talking a parent's language" --Terrence Gaines, PCMag.comNew and notable:â¢ Quickly swipe to see rich and detailed photos of real estate properties and rentals that interest you.  The only true search of homes for sale by school or school district - make sure your dream home includes your dream school!â¢ Property listing details now include property tax, sales history and more school information including ratings.â¢Draw your own custom search area right on the map! (aka Area Highlighter)â¢Search nearby houses for sale, open houses, recently sold homes, and rentals with one touch.â¢Use Area Scout to see results and average values of houses update as you moveâ¢Stay updated on the true status of real estate listings, including foreclosures, just taken off market, and price-reduced homes for sale.â¢90% of listings updated every 15 minutes. All the rest updated at least once a day.â¢Sign-in to save searches and listings. Access them again on your mobile phone or online at www.realtor.com.For real estate agents:â¢Connect and search with your clients!Learn more at http://marketing.realtor.com/collaborate Come hang with us!http://twitter.com/REALTORdotcomhttp://www.facebook.com/realtor.com

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: This app is so easy to use and convenient! I actually like using  the app better than getting on the computer! If your looking for a house, don\'t hesitate,  download it now!
reviews.author: Carissa Dyer

reviews.title: Love it! Great app!
reviews.comment: I can drive thru an area that I am interested in and pull up any homes for sale instantly. So easy.
reviews.author: Julie Bennett

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I haven\'t bought a house yet but this app blows away other apps of its nature. Deft worth a download if u are house hunting
reviews.author: Eli Caudill

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Nice interface, good output.  Sometimes confusing but nice format for listings.
reviews.author: Jean Cowan Younis

reviews.title: Rental listings scarce...
reviews.comment: In Southwestern PA. I\'ve done 3 searches to include up to 40 miles from my preferred town. Even with only 1 or 2 filters, no results for rentals. Frustrating.
reviews.author: Dawn R.F.

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Really easy to use. Can\'t find any features that I wish it did have. Quick responding and never errors or freezing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Best real estate app for all platforms.
reviews.author: Adria Brodie

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This works as it is supposed to with no glitches.
reviews.author: Anna Lucero

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I would love to  see  more  houses  .
reviews.author: Bryant Gibson

reviews.title: Seems pretty good so far
reviews.comment: .... and everything seems to work too
reviews.author: Larry Blake

reviews.title: Good interface, easy to navigate
reviews.comment: Great search options, and reliable information.remembers recent searches and easy to drag around map searching too!
reviews.author: Christina Johnson

reviews.title: Very easy and informative.
reviews.comment: Looking for a house can be quite annoying, but this site has made it a little easy for me. Very easy to search certain areas and so on. Plus love the tips on buying.
reviews.author: Nicole Epps

reviews.comment: Easy to access detailed information on houses you search for.
reviews.author: Jeremy Gill

reviews.title: Really like this app.
reviews.comment: Very useful!
reviews.author: Letitia Washington

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This a great app, love that you can search in an area.  This makes it easy when you are driving around looking at propery.
reviews.author: Daniella Margadant Silver

reviews.title: Looking for a house
reviews.comment: Gives a nice sense of the market in a usable interface.
reviews.author: Andrew Fournier

reviews.comment: Excellent! Most up to date realestate app!
reviews.author: Liz Austin

reviews.title: I guess better than Zillow/Trulia
reviews.comment: Wish it has avg mortgage rates in menu to display.
reviews.author: KJ Parikh

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: Just great
reviews.author: Brian Coakley

reviews.title: Great app for research!
reviews.comment: I work with investors all across the States and I use this app daily for my business.
reviews.author: Darren Bassett
